test.name: Processo de compra de uma camiseta "Vira lata caramelo" no Site do Chico Rei

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Set Selenium Speed
kw.doc: Sets the delay that is waited after each Selenium command.

kw.name: Clicar em "Concordar" no aviso sobre Cookies
Pesquisar por "Vira lata caramelo" e selecionar a primeira opção da lista de resultados
Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Vira lata caramelo' into text field 'id=header-search-input-desktop'.
